title: Flight Simulator 2024 - MSFS Update - what we currently know and what not
description:
In this video we will look at which information is already available for Flight Simulator 2024 which will be released later this year. Besides some screenshots we will discuss:

- what improvements to expect
- which airliners will be included
- which 3rd party developers are working already on new aircrafts: including 
  types of aircrafts
- what will change for things you already bought
- what will happen with the activities section

Although there is still a lot unknown it will give you some more information compared to what was already known until now.
